scripts.codegen:snx: npm run prepare:snx && npm run codegen && npm run cleanup
scripts.codegen:rates: npm run prepare:rates && npm run codegen && npm run cleanup
scripts.codegen:exchanges: npm run prepare:exchanges && npm run codegen && npm run cleanup
scripts.deploy:snx: npm run prepare:snx && npm run deploy -- --access-token $THEGRAPH_SNX_ACCESS_TOKEN synthetixio-team/synthetix; EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy:rates: npm run prepare:rates && npm run deploy -- --access-token $THEGRAPH_SNX_ACCESS_TOKEN synthetixio-team/synthetix-rates; EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy:exchanges: npm run prepare:exchanges && npm run deploy -- --access-token $THEGRAPH_SNX_ACCESS_TOKEN synthetixio-team/synthetix-exchanges; EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE

hooks.pre-commit: npm run compress && git add index.min.js
